document_api_meta.title: Get Message Templates
document_api_meta.env_desc: Get a library of customer engagement message templates predefined by TikTok Shop, which you can use directly in your customer engagement communications.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_query_param.name: locale
request_query_param.desc:
The BCP-47 locale codes for displaying the message content, delimited by commas. Default: en-US

Refer to [Locale codes](678e3a47bae28f030a8c7523) for the list of supported locale codes.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^message_templates
response_param.desc: Customer engagement message templates predefined by TikTok Shop.

response_param.name: ^^message_body
response_param.example: We strive to create products with you in mind. Check out our newest drop to find your perfect fit that’s built for a confidence boost.

response_param.name: ^^product_card_rules
response_param.desc: Rules on the number and type of interactive product cards that can be included in a message.

response_param.name: ^^^min_count
response_param.desc: The minimum number of product cards that must be included.

response_param.name: ^^^max_count
response_param.desc: The maximum number of product cards that can be included.

response_param.name: ^^coupon_card_rules
response_param.desc: Rules on the number and type of interactive coupon cards that can be included in a message.

response_param.name: ^^^min_count
response_param.desc: The minimum number of coupon cards that must be included.

response_param.name: ^^^max_count
response_param.desc: The maximum number of coupon cards that can be included.

response_param.name: ^^^coupon_type
response_param.desc:
The types of coupon that can be included in the message. 
Possible values:
- REGULAR_ALL: Regular coupons that target all buyers. 
Required coupon properties: `coupons.display_type=REGULAR` and `coupons.target_buyer_segment=ALL` in the [Search Coupons API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6699dcdf115ebe02f841e4cd).
- REGULAR_REPEAT: Regular coupons that target only repeat buyers. 
Required coupon properties: `coupons.display_type=REGULAR` and `coupons.target_buyer_segment=REPEAT_CUSTOMERS` in the [Search Coupons API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6699dcdf115ebe02f841e4cd).

error_code_list.msg: Access denied. This endpoint is not available for this shop as the seller does not meet the access criteria for CRM features. See TikTok Shop Academy for details.

document_api_meta.response_body: {"code":0,"data":{"message_templates":[{"id":"8646958016719848812","message_title":"Meet your next favorite thing!","message_body":"We strive to create products with you in mind. Check out our newest drop to find your perfect fit that’s built for a confidence boost.","product_card_rules":{"min_count":0,"max_count":4},"coupon_card_rules":{"min_count":1,"max_count":1,"coupon_type":["REGULAR_ALL,REGULAR_REPEAT"]}}]},"message":"Success","request_id":"202203070749000101890810281E8C70B7"}

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to obtain customer engagement resources, such as predefined message templates, or engagement task performance data.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to obtain customer engagement resources, such as predefined message templates, or engagement task performance data.
